description:
Kano Saburou is http://anidb.net/ch131367 [Houjou Tokiyuki]`s instructor in the martial arts, including archery.
He and a fellow instructor, http://anidb.net/ch146929 [Shiota no Jirou], are often seen chasing Tokiyuki, who is reluctant to train.
Jirou and Saburou die early on in a battle against http://anidb.net/ch141562 [Ashikaga Takauji]`s forces.
name: Kano Saburou
